title: Bug 22360[Fonts] FontRegistry can not be instantiated using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource
description: Bug 22360[Fonts] FontRegistry can not be instantiated using resources outside org.eclipse.jface.resource. Therefore, all the resources that are being looked up are the only ones relative to the location of the FontRegistry classorg.eclipse.jface.resource path. It can be remedied if FontRegistry took a client class (or class loader) as an additional parameter to the constructor.
OB: The current issue is that the FontRegistry class does not allow the use of resources located outside the org.eclipse.jface.resource package. This becomes a problem when trying to instantiate the FontRegistry using resources from a different location.
EB: The FontRegistry class should be modified to accept a client class (or class loader) as an additional parameter to the constructor. This would allow the instantiation of FontRegistry using resources from any location.
